meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kimberly Kist Matthias Clark Kyle Becker Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7647.

td.p: Kimberly Kist, a retired teacher from Williamsport, Pennsylvania
Matthias Clark, a financial software consultant from River Forest, Illinois
Kyle Becker, a research scientist from Nashville, Tennessee (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,401)

tr.td: HALLS OF FAME
(Alex: We'll give you some members. You identify the Halls of Fame for us.)
COOKBOOKS
WAR IS OVER
9-LETTER WORDS
"U" LOVE MUSIC
A TRIP TO ITALY

tr.td: Kyle

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Matthias] Going for the council of what?)
(Matthias: Nicaea.)
...
(Alex: [To Kyle] Remember, 1814, 1815, just after the defeat of Napoleon. Napoleon\'s off to Elba. This was [*].)
KimberlyWhat is the coronation
$5,000
MatthiasWhat is the Council of N
$5,800
KyleWhat is the College of Cardinals?
$201
the Congress of Vienna')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'This 1814-1815 gathering of leaders prompted Beethoven to compose the cantata "The Glorious Moment"')

tr.td: 19th CENTURY EUROPE
This 1814-1815 gathering of leaders prompted Beethoven to compose the cantata "The Glorious Moment"
Kyle
Matthias
Kimberly
2-day champion: $30,400
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Kyle
Matthias
Kimberly

15 R
(including 3 DDs),
5 W

7 R,
3 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
